column2: A powerful practitioner of Necromancy, writing the book known as the Grimoire Necris, which allowed his ascension to undeath
The Dread King was a mighty warrior, giant in stature, armed with a massive sword and covered in ancient heavy armour. He could cut down his enemies in their droves.
A master in the lore of dak magic, able to summon vast armies of undead to fight for him.
He being known as the Dread King was known to have been one of Nagash's most powerful followers, aiding him in his early attempts to bring undeath to the world, he served Nagash well

he Dread King's name was derived from a powerful aura that surrounded him at all times, only the mightiest of beings could face him without physically shaking or panicking, most would be frozen in fear or outright flee
The steeds of the Midnight Aristocracy are unnatural destriers called Nightmares. They are Undead stallions clad in baroque barding.
Animated by Dark Magic, a zombie dragon is an unholy parody of a once-noble beast now borne aloft by great tattered wings, its body covered with thick, withered hide.
Claiming the souls of the living, trapped inside the sword. once filled allows the summoning of great warriors
